metadata.title: CVE-2024-41069 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ASoC: topology: Fix references to freed memoryMost users after parsing a topology file, release memory used by it, sohaving pointer references directly into topology file contents is wrong.Use devm_kmemdup(), to allocate memory as needed.
